42 public static List<int> GetTagsIdPublicacio(int id)

51 public static string GetTagsTextPublicacio(int id)
52 {
53 List<int> listint = GetTagsIdPublicacio(id);
54 string text = "";
55 foreach (int i in listint)
56 {
57 text += ", " + TagDB.GetTag(i).Nom;
58 }
59 if(text.Length > 0) text = text.Substring(2);
60 return text;
61 }
62 }
63}
